euConformityDeclarationDocument.title: euConformityDeclarationDocument
euConformityDeclarationDocument.description: URI of the EU declaration of conformity signed by responsible economic operators to declare compliance with the regulatory requirements in the context of the market conformity assessment procedure and assume full responsibility.

euConformityDeclarationID.title: euConformityDeclarationID
euConformityDeclarationID.description: Identification number of the EU declaration of conformity of the battery, linked to the Battery Carbon Footprint Declaration.

euComplianceTestResultsReport.title: euComplianceTestResultsReport
euComplianceTestResultsReport.description: URI to the results of tests reports proving compliance in the market conformity assessment procedure with the requirements as per the technical documentation.

separateCollectionSymbol.title: separateCollectionSymbol
separateCollectionSymbol.description: URI to the separate collection' or 'WEEE label' indicating that a product should not be discarded as unsorted waste but must be sent to separate collection facilities for recovery and recycling.

labelsSymbolsMeaning.title: labelsSymbolsMeaning
labelsSymbolsMeaning.description: Explanation of the meaning of all symbols and labels.

cadmiumLeadSymbols.title: cadmiumLeadSymbols
cadmiumLeadSymbols.description: Image of Cadmium and lead symbols indicating the metal is contained in the battery above a defined threshold.
